skins.shipDescription: C-class destroyer ©` Comet, Hull Number H00!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Comet of C class. My first assignment was at the Far East, and then I got transferred to The Home Fleet to be equipped with water mine rails. Actually, I'm a little worried about rumors of something happening to the homeland...
skins.acquisition: I'm Comet of the C-class destroyers! I'm happy that I have your support, Commander!
skins.login: ?Lalala?~ Is my song a good one?
skins.details: Commander~ Is Comet dazzling and shining~? Nnngh... This is so embarrassing...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, why are you not giving me attention?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm a little homesick... Just a little!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I, er-hm! I'm everyone's idol, Comet! Should I change my pose a little?
skins.secretaryTouch: If I become an idol, I'll let you shake my hand too, Commander
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wha! If someone see this, I won't be able to become an idol~!

skins.shipDescription: Do ya reckon... I you think I've become more idol-like? Mhm! As a new idol, I'll show y'all... I'll show you how hard I work as a new idol!
skins.acquisition: Do ya reckon... I you think I've become more idol-like? Mhm! As a new idol, I'll show y'all... I'll show you how hard I work as a new idol!
skins.details: Although the long hours I spent practicing by myself were lonely, being able to see everyone's smiling faces while I was on stage made me really happy!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, wanna help me come up with a signature pose?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ugh... I wanna be able to snack all day like Cygnet, but my figure...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I am everyone's idol, Comet~ Hmm... whaddya think about this pose, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Even if I manage to become an actual idol, I won't leave your side, Commander!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek! Cut that out... I-I'm an idol after all!
